long_description: Keep your hydration system fresh and clean with these easy-to-use tablets specially formulated for CamelBak(R) reservoirs. Safe, chlorine dioxide formula dissolves quickly to remove deposits that can build up over time in the reservoir and delivery tube. Each tablet cleans up to a 100-ounce reservoir. Includes 8 packets.
short_description: Keep your hydration system fresh and clean with these easy-to-use tablets specially formulated for CamelBak(R) reservoirs.
